name: ConceptMapR5TimingElementsForR4Timing
title: Cross-version ConceptMap for FHIR R5 resources in FHIR R4
description: This ConceptMap represents the cross-version mapping of resource FHIR R5 for use in FHIR R4.

target.comment:
FHIR R5 ComplexType `Timing` is representable via FHIR R4 extensions.
Element `Timing` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Timing`.
Element `Timing.event` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Timing.event`.
Element `Timing.repeat` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Timing.repeat`.

Note that the target element context `Timing.repeat.bounds[x]` is a choice-type element and cannot directly hold extensions. The context is moved up to parent element `Timing.repeat`.
